fields.summary: Android: Text entry for TextField within ListView not working correctly with Android 5.0
fields.environment:
Titanium 3.5.1 GA
Android 5.0.0
Google Nexus 6 with Android 5.0.0 (running on Genymotion)

comments.body:
Any update on this? Seems like a rather major issue to me.

Thanks.
This happens on Android 5.1 too. Is there any progress or priority on this? This really blocks my development!

Verified the fix.

Entering text in to a textfield within a listview now works as expected.

Closing.

Environment:
Appc Studio :  4.1.0.201506151224
Ti SDK :  4.1.0.v20150617152826
Ti CLI : 4.0.1
Alloy : 1.6.2
MAC Yosemite : 10.10.3
